mapper.sql: LOGID, USERID, IP, BROWSER, MESSAGE, STACKTRACE, ACTION, ERRORCLASS, INTIME
mapper.select:
select count(0) from sys_errorlog e left join Sys_User u on u.id = e.userid where 1=1
and u.organizationcode in (select code from view_organization Where FIND_IN_SET(code,getChildList(#{organizationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) )
and u.username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND date_format(e.INTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BETWEEN #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select e.*,u.username from sys_errorlog e left join Sys_User u on u.id = e.userid where 1=1
and u.organizationcode in (select code from view_organization Where FIND_IN_SET(code,getChildList(#{organizationcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) )
and u.username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND date_format(e.INTIME,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') BETWEEN #{starttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and #{endtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
order by e.intime DESC
mapper.insert:
insert into SYS_ERRORLOG
USERID,
IP,
BROWSER,
MESSAGE,
STACKTRACE,
ACTION,
ERRORCLASS,
INTIME,
#{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{stacktrace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{errorclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{intime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update SYS_ERRORLOG
USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BROWSER = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MESSAGE = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STACKTRACE = #{stacktrace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERRORCLASS = #{errorclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTIME = #{intime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where LOGID = #{logid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SYS_ERRORLOG set USERID = #{userid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BROWSER = #{browser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MESSAGE = #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STACKTRACE = #{stacktrace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERRORCLASS = #{errorclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTIME = #{intime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where LOGID = #{logid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
